output:
Even now, and even now, and even now I see That you were meant for me
Every night, and every night, and every night I find That love will conquer time
Stars shine bright every day and night Stars shine bright for you
The moon still glows, everybody knows The moon still glows for you
For you
Like a river's child you keep flowing all the while Till the lights beyond do set you free
I believe it's true
All the while, and all the while, and all the while we see Your love will carry me
Stars shine bright every day and night Stars shine bright for you
The moon still glows, everybody knows The moon still glows for you
For you
